name: workers-for-platforms-template
description: A template for building website hosting platforms using Cloudflare Workers for Platforms. Deploy static sites and custom Workers code through a simple web interface.

CLOUDFLARE_API_KEY.description: Your Cloudflare Global API Key. Find at dash.cloudflare.com/profile/api-tokens under 'Global API Key'.

CLOUDFLARE_API_EMAIL.description: The email address associated with your Cloudflare account.

ACCOUNT_ID.description: Your Cloudflare Account ID. Find in the URL: dash.cloudflare.com/<ACCOUNT_ID>

DISPATCH_NAMESPACE_API_TOKEN.description: API Token with Workers Scripts Edit permission. Create at dash.cloudflare.com/profile/api-tokens using 'Edit Cloudflare Workers' template.

CUSTOM_DOMAIN.description: (Optional) Your root domain for hosting sites (e.g., platform.com). Leave empty to use workers.dev subdomain.

CLOUDFLARE_ZONE_ID.description: (Optional) Zone ID for custom hostname management. Find in Cloudflare dashboard under domain Overview page.

FALLBACK_ORIGIN.description: (Optional) Hostname for customer CNAMEs (e.g., my.platform.com). Required for custom domain support.
